issue: Payment deducted but order was not placed
resolution: Payment verified and refund initiated to original payment method within 3â€“5 business days

issue: Order marked delivered but customer did not receive it
resolution: Delivery investigation opened and replacement order created

issue: Refund not received even after 7 days
resolution: Refund delay escalated to finance team and customer informed

issue: Wrong item delivered instead of ordered product
resolution: Replacement order created and return pickup scheduled

issue: Account locked due to multiple failed login attempts
resolution: Account unlocked after identity verification and password reset link sent

issue: Customer received an item with missing accessories
resolution: Missing accessories shipped separately at no additional cost

issue: Order automatically cancelled due to address verification failure
resolution: Customer address confirmed and order successfully re-created

issue: Customer charged delivery fee despite being eligible for free shipping
resolution: Delivery charges refunded after eligibility verification

issue: Return pickup not attempted on scheduled date
resolution: Return pickup rescheduled and customer notified
Invoice corrected and updated invoice shared with customer

issue: Product delivered later than promised delivery date
resolution: Delivery delay acknowledged and compensation credit issued

issue: Customer unable to apply promotional coupon during checkout
resolution: Coupon conditions explained and manual discount applied

issue: Order returned but refund not initiated
resolution: Return receipt confirmed and refund initiated

issue: Customer account flagged for suspicious activity
resolution: Account secured after verification and access restored

issue: Customer received refurbished item instead of new
resolution: Replacement with new item approved and return arranged
